Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals article 26 of the tax law known as the estate tax
LawCode: Rpld Art 26, amd ยง1825, Tax L; amd ยง11-1712, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to taxable estates; and to repeal article 26 of the tax law relating thereto
